BookMark.del: DELETE FROM Dreame.Bookmarks WHERE (UserID like %s AND StoreID like %s AND StoreType like %s)
BookMark.list: SELECT StoreInfo.StoreID, StoreInfo.StoreType, StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat,Tag.CateName, Tag.SubCateName,  StoreDetail.StoreName,StoreDetail.StorePhoto FROM Dreame.Bookmarks INNER JOIN Dreame.StoreDetail ON(StoreDetail.StoreID like Bookmarks.StoreID AND StoreDetail.StoreType like Bookmarks.StoreType) INNER JOIN Dreame.StoreInfo ON(StoreInfo.StoreID like Bookmarks.StoreID AND StoreInfo.StoreType like Bookmarks.StoreType)INNER JOIN Dreame.Tag ON (StoreInfo.Category like Tag.Category AND StoreInfo.SubCategory like Tag.SubCategory) WHERE Bookmarks.UserID like %s

FoodShare.add: INSERT INTO Dreame.FoodShare(WritingID, UploadTime, Title, Contents, Photo1, Photo2, Photo3,UserID,Town) VALUES(now(), now(), %s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s,%s)
FoodShare.del: DELETE FROM Dreame.FoodShare WHERE (UserID like %s AND WritingID = %s)
FoodShare.detail: SELECT WritingID,UploadTime,Title,Contents,Photo1,Photo2,Photo3,UserID FROM Dreame.FoodShare WHERE (WritingID = %s AND UserID like %s)
FoodShare.getList: SELECT WritingID, UploadTime, Title, Photo1, UserID, Town FROM Dreame.FoodShare WHERE (Town like %s) ORDER BY UploadTime DESC
FoodShare.modify: UPDATE Dreame.FoodShare SET UploadTime = now(), Photo1 =%s, Photo2 = %s, Photo3 = %s, Title = %s, Contents = %s, Town = %s WHERE UserID like %s and WritingID = %s

Map.MyPosition: SELECT StoreInfo.StoreID, StoreInfo.StoreType, StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat,StoreDetail.StoreName, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s,%s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) AS Distance FROM Dreame.StoreInfo INNER JOIN Dreame.StoreDetail ON (StoreInfo.StoreID = StoreDetail.StoreID AND StoreInfo.StoreType like StoreDetail.StoreType) WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) <= %s ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 50
Map.ChooseCate: SELECT StoreInfo.StoreID, StoreInfo.StoreType, StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat,Tag.CateName, Tag.SubCateName, StoreInfo.Category, StoreInfo.SubCategory, StoreDetail.StorePhoto, StoreDetail.StoreName, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) AS Distance FROM Dreame.StoreInfo INNER JOIN Dreame.Tag ON (StoreInfo.Category like Tag.Category AND StoreInfo.SubCategory like Tag.SubCategory) INNER JOIN Dreame.StoreDetail ON (StoreInfo.StoreID = StoreDetail.StoreID AND StoreInfo.StoreType = StoreDetail.StoreType) WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) <= %s AND StoreInfo.Category like %s ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 50
Map.ChooseSub: SELECT StoreInfo.StoreID, StoreInfo.StoreType, StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat,Tag.CateName, Tag.SubCateName, StoreInfo.Category, StoreInfo.SubCategory, StoreDetail.StorePhoto, StoreDetail.StoreName, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) AS Distance FROM Dreame.StoreInfo INNER JOIN Dreame.Tag ON (StoreInfo.Category like Tag.Category AND StoreInfo.SubCategory like Tag.SubCategory)INNER JOIN Dreame.StoreDetail ON (StoreInfo.StoreID = StoreDetail.StoreID AND StoreInfo.StoreType = StoreDetail.StoreType) WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) <= %s AND StoreInfo.Category like %s AND StoreInfo.SubCategory like %s ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 50
Map.ChooseStoreType: SELECT StoreInfo.StoreID, StoreInfo.StoreType, StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat, Tag.CateName, Tag.SubCateName, StoreInfo.Category, StoreInfo.SubCategory, StoreDetail.StorePhoto, StoreDetail.StoreName, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) AS Distance FROM Dreame.StoreInfo INNER JOIN Dreame.Tag ON (StoreInfo.Category like Tag.Category AND StoreInfo.SubCategory like Tag.SubCategory) INNER JOIN Dreame.StoreDetail ON (StoreInfo.StoreID = StoreDetail.StoreID AND StoreInfo.StoreType = StoreDetail.StoreType) WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) <= %s AND StoreInfo.StoreType like %s ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 50
Map.KeywordSearch: SELECT StoreInfo.StoreID, StoreInfo.StoreType, StoreDetail.StorePhoto, StoreDetail.StoreName, Tag.CateName, Tag.SubCateName, StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat, StoreInfo.Category, StoreInfo.SubCategory, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) AS Distance FROM Dreame.StoreInfo INNER JOIN Dreame.Tag ON (StoreInfo.Category like Tag.Category AND StoreInfo.SubCategory like Tag.SubCategory) INNER JOIN Dreame.StoreDetail ON (StoreInfo.StoreID = StoreDetail.StoreID AND StoreInfo.StoreType = StoreDetail.StoreType) WHERE (ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(%s, %s),POINT(StoreInfo.StorePointLng, StoreInfo.StorePointLat)) <= %s AND (StoreDetail.StoreName like  CONCAT('%%', %s, '%%') OR Tag.CateName like  CONCAT('%%', %s, '%%') OR Tag.SubCateName like  CONCAT('%%', %s, '%%'))) ORDER BY Distance LIMIT 50
Map.StoreDetail: SELECT StoreInfo.StoreID, StoreInfo.StoreType, StoreDetail.StorePhoto, StoreDetail.StoreName, Tag.CateName, Tag.SubCateName, StoreDetail.Address, StoreDetail.DetailAddress, StoreDetail.DayStart,StoreDetail.DayFinish, StoreDetail.SatStart, StoreDetail.SatFinish, StoreDetail.HoliStart, StoreDetail.HoliFinish,StoreDetail.Item, StoreDetail.Provided1, StoreDetail.Provided2, StoreDetail.Phone, StoreDetail.WorkDay,StoreInfo.StorePointLng,StoreInfo.StorePointLat,(CASE WHEN Bookmarks.UserID like %s THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)AS Bookmarked FROM Dreame.StoreInfo INNER JOIN Dreame.Tag ON (StoreInfo.Category like Tag.Category AND StoreInfo.SubCategory like Tag.SubCategory)INNER JOIN Dreame.StoreDetail ON (StoreInfo.StoreID = StoreDetail.StoreID AND StoreInfo.StoreType = StoreDetail.StoreType)LEFT OUTER JOIN Dreame.Bookmarks ON (StoreInfo.StoreID = Bookmarks.StoreID AND StoreInfo.StoreType = StoreDetail.StoreType) WHERE (StoreInfo.StoreID = %s AND StoreInfo.StoreType like %s)

MyPage.AKA: UPDATE Dreame.UserInfo SET AKA = %s WHERE UserID like %s
MyPage.Town: UPDATE Dreame.UserInfo SET Town = %s WHERE UserID like %s
MyPage.getCard: SELECT Card FROM Dreame.UserInfo WHERE (UserID like %s)

City.Si: SELECT Distinct(Si) FROM Dreame.CityList WHERE Do like %s
City.GunGu: SELECT Distinct(GunGu) FROM Dreame.CityList WHERE Do like %s AND Si like %s
